modName: All Dragon Armors - weapons and MASKS
descriptionHtml:
All dragon armor + weapons such as 

-- Dragon Plate Armour

-- Some Weapons

-- Dragon Masks [all of them] [SEPERATE FILES]

-- Dragon Scaled Armour

-- Including the shields

Location 
------------
High Hrothgar [Where The GreyBeards Are]


Installation
----------------
Put the folders in your Skyrim\\Data Folder

Uninstallation
-------------------
Delete The Files That You downloaded                                                                     


NOTICE
---------
All Masks are coming soon ! , I F YOU WOULD LIKE EVERYTHING Open up console and type in 
coc qasmoke
